1_executive_summary.title: Executive Summary
1_executive_summary.content: Implemented generator-based DO/DON'T library for boundary rules and DB-first patterns. Creates deterministic docs/boundary-examples.md from database queries and file analysis. Total: 98 lines.

2_completeness_report.title: Completeness Report
2_completeness_report.content:
✅ Created scripts/generate-boundary-examples.js (98 lines)
✅ Added npm script 'docs:boundary'
✅ Updated CLAUDE.md generator with reference
✅ Generated docs/boundary-examples.md successfully
✅ Includes 10+ DO/DON'T pairs with real paths
✅ Database-first, no hardcoded content

3_deliverables_manifest.title: Deliverables Manifest
3_deliverables_manifest.content:
1. scripts/generate-boundary-examples.js - Main generator
2. package.json - Added docs:boundary script
3. scripts/generate-claude-md-from-db.js - Added reference
4. docs/boundary-examples.md - Generated output
5. Two main sections: SD Statusing, Retrospectives
6. Ask-Before-Act triggers section included

4_key_decisions_rationale.title: Key Decisions & Rationale
4_key_decisions_rationale.content:
1. Query information_schema for tables - dynamic discovery
2. Filter scripts by name pattern - relevant subset
3. Include both databases with clear boundaries
4. Generate timestamp for traceability
5. Use markdown tables for clarity

5_known_issues_risks.title: Known Issues & Risks
5_known_issues_risks.content:
1. Table query returns 0 active - may need schema fix
2. Module type warning (cosmetic)
3. Script discovery based on naming patterns
4. No versioning of generated doc

6_resource_utilization.content:

Lines: 98 (script) + 1 (package.json) + 1 (CLAUDE.md generator)

7_action_items.content:

2. Add more DO/DON'T patterns as discovered
3. Consider adding version tracking
